data.text: @oldhondarules @thehill It shouldn't be this way I don't understand why we can't take care of our own no one should ever have catastrophic medical bills for any reason! If Canada, France & Cuba have universal health care why can't the USA?
@thehill I shudder to think what that bill looks like.
@HonuHerd @thehill And geeze only about 1 million died from it

@doodlebug68018 @thehill I’m not anti-vaccine. I was just pointing out that extended hospital stays come with enormous bills, regardless of medical coverage and whatever aid someone is eligible for.  This is how it is in America, unfortunately.
@thehill Meanwhile, millions of Americans get the sniffles, a minor sore throat, a mild fever and wonder 5 days later "this is why we stomped on civil liberties and kept kids from schools?"
@oldhondarules @thehill I've heard that God will save me unfortunately to many people don't realize he's trying which is why he gave us the vaccine!

@oldhondarules @thehill You're wrong the government is helping to cover the medical costs of treating covid-19. My brother had the same attitude and he died from covid leaving behind a 7 year old daughter and his wife! I have no doubt if he had the covid vaccination he would still be here!
@thehill He could’ve gone home last week.
@thehill Only ten days for Covid the remaining 540 don’t count as a Covid hospitalization.
